Class Shelter<T extends Pet>

java.lang.Object
petadoption.model.Shelter<T>
Type Parameters:
T - any subclass of Pet
public class Shelter<T extends Pet> extends Object
Shelter is a generic class that manages a list of pets. It allows adding, removing, sorting, and adopting pets.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Shelter()
    Constructs an empty shelter.

      public boolean removePetById(String id)
      Removes a pet from the shelter based on ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pet to remove
      Returns:
      true if the pet was removed, false if not found
